values.description: Long put backspread, a combination of bull put spread and long put, consists of selling a higher-strike put and buying two lower-srtike puts with the same expiry.
values.keywords: put backspread, bull put spread, unlimited-reward-limited-risk strategy, strategy payoff, early assignment
